member.name: F:Accord.Video.Kinect.LedColorOption.BlinkRedYellow

member.name: T:Accord.Video.Kinect.Kinect
member.summary: The class provides access to Microsoft's Xbox Kinect controller.

remarks.para: The class allows to manipulate Kinec device by changing its LED color, setting motor's tilt value and accessing its camera. See and classes, which provide access to actual video.

para.note: In order to run correctly the class requires freenect.dll library to be put into solution's output folder. This can be found within the AForge.NET framework's distribution in Externals folder.

remarks.para: Sample usage:

member.name: P:Accord.Video.Kinect.Kinect.DeviceID
member.summary: ID of the opened Kinect device.

member.name: P:Accord.Video.Kinect.Kinect.DeviceCount
member.summary: Number of Kinect devices available in the system.

member.name: M:Accord.Video.Kinect.Kinect.GetDevice(System.Int32)
member.summary: Get initialized instance of the Kinect device.
member.param: ID of the Kinect device to get instance of, [0, ),
member.returns: Returns initialized Kinect device. Use method when the device is no longer required.
member.exception: There is no Kinect device with specified ID connected to the system.
Failed connecting to the Kinect device specified ID.

member.name: M:Accord.Video.Kinect.Kinect.Finalize
member.summary: Object finalizer/destructor makes sure unmanaged resource are freed if user did not call .

member.name: M:Accord.Video.Kinect.Kinect.Dispose
member.summary: Dispose device freeing all associated unmanaged resources.

member.name: M:Accord.Video.Kinect.Kinect.SetLedColor(Accord.Video.Kinect.LedColorOption)
member.summary: Set color of Kinect's LED.
member.exception: Some error occurred with the device. Check error message.

member.name: M:Accord.Video.Kinect.Kinect.SetMotorTilt(System.Int32)
member.summary: Set motor's tilt value.
member.exception: Motor tilt has to be in the [-31, 31] range.
Some error occurred with the device. Check error message.

member.name: M:Accord.Video.Kinect.Kinect.GetAccelerometerValues(System.Double@,System.Double@,System.Double@)
member.summary: Get accelerometer values for 3 axes.
member.param: X axis value on the accelerometer.
Y axis value on the accelerometer.
Z axis value on the accelerometer.

remarks.para: Units of all 3 values are m/s2. The g value used for calculations is taken as 9.80665 m/s2.

member.name: M:Accord.Video.Kinect.Kinect.GetVideoCamera
member.summary: Get Kinect's video camera.

remarks.para: The method simply creates instance of the class by calling its appropriate constructor. Use method to start the video then.

member.name: M:Accord.Video.Kinect.Kinect.GetDepthCamera
member.summary: Get Kinect's depth camera.

remarks.para: The method simply creates instance of the class by calling its appropriate constructor. Use method to start the video then.

member.name: T:Accord.Video.Kinect.KinectDepthCamera
member.summary: Video source for Microsoft Kinect's depth sensor.

remarks.para: The video source captures depth data from Microsoft Kinect depth sensor, which is aimed originally as a gaming device for XBox 360 platform.

para.note: Prior to using the class, make sure you've installed Kinect's drivers as described on Open Kinect project's page.
In order to run correctly the class requires freenect.dll library to be put into solution's output folder. This can be found within the AForge.NET framework's distribution in Externals folder.

remarks.para: Sample usage:

member.name: E:Accord.Video.Kinect.KinectDepthCamera.NewFrame
member.summary: New frame event.

remarks.para: Notifies clients about new available frames from the video source.

para.note: Since video source may have multiple clients, each client is responsible for making a copy (cloning) of the passed video frame, because the video source disposes its own original copy after notifying of clients.

member.name: E:Accord.Video.Kinect.KinectDepthCamera.VideoSourceError
member.summary: Video source error event.
member.remarks: This event is used to notify clients about any type of errors occurred in video source object, for example internal exceptions.

member.name: E:Accord.Video.Kinect.KinectDepthCamera.PlayingFinished
member.summary: Video playing finished event.

remarks.para: This event is used to notify clients that the video playing has finished.

member.name: P:Accord.Video.Kinect.KinectDepthCamera.ProvideOriginalDepthImage
member.summary: Provide original depth image or colored depth map.

remarks.para: The property specifies if the video source should provide original data provided by Kinect's depth sensor or provide colored depth map. If the property is set to , then the video source will provide 16 bpp grayscale images, where 11 least significant bits represent data provided by the sensor. If the property is set to , then the video source will provide 24 bpp color images, which represents depth map. In this case depth is encoded by color gradient: white->red->yellow->green->cyan->blue->black. So colors which are closer to white represent objects which are closer to the Kinect sensor, but colors which are closer to black represent objects which are further away from Kinect.

para.note: The property must be set before running the video source to take effect.

remarks.para: Default value is set to .

member.name: P:Accord.Video.Kinect.KinectDepthCamera.Resolution
member.summary: Resolution of depth sensor to set.

para.note: The property must be set before running the video source to take effect.

remarks.para: Default value of the property is set to .

member.name: P:Accord.Video.Kinect.KinectDepthCamera.Source
member.summary: A string identifying the video source.

member.name: P:Accord.Video.Kinect.KinectDepthCamera.IsRunning
member.summary: State of the video source.
member.remarks: Current state of video source object - running or not.

member.name: P:Accord.Video.Kinect.KinectDepthCamera.BytesReceived
member.summary: Received bytes count.
member.remarks: Number of bytes the video source provided from the moment of the last access to the property.

member.name: P:Accord.Video.Kinect.KinectDepthCamera.FramesReceived
member.summary: Received frames count.
member.remarks: Number of frames the video source provided from the moment of the last access to the property.

member.name: M:Accord.Video.Kinect.KinectDepthCamera.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: Kinect's device ID (index) to connect to.

member.name: M:Accord.Video.Kinect.KinectDepthCamera.#ctor(System.Int32,Accord.Video.Kinect.CameraResolution)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: Kinect's device ID (index) to connect to.
Resolution of depth sensor to set.

member.name: M:Accord.Video.Kinect.KinectDepthCamera.#ctor(System.Int32,Accord.Video.Kinect.CameraResolution,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: Kinect's device ID (index) to connect to.
Resolution of depth sensor to set.
Provide original depth image or colored depth map (see property).

member.name: M:Accord.Video.Kinect.KinectDepthCamera.Start
member.summary: Start video source.
member.remarks: Starts video source and returns execution to caller. Video camera will be started and will provide new video frames through the event.
member.exception: The specified resolution is not supported for the selected mode of the Kinect depth sensor.
Could not connect to Kinect's depth sensor.
Another connection to the specified depth sensor is already running.

member.name: M:Accord.Video.Kinect.KinectDepthCamera.SignalToStop
member.summary: Signal video source to stop its work.

para.note: Calling this method is equivalent to calling for Kinect video camera.

member.name: M:Accord.Video.Kinect.KinectDepthCamera.WaitForStop
member.summary: Wait for video source has stopped.

para.note: Calling this method is equivalent to calling for Kinect video camera.

member.name: M:Accord.Video.Kinect.KinectDepthCamera.Stop
member.summary: Stop video source.

remarks.para: The method stop the video source, so it no longer provides new video frames and does not consume any resources.

member.name: T:Accord.Video.Kinect.VideoCameraMode
member.summary: Enumeration of video camera modes for the .

member.name: F:Accord.Video.Kinect.VideoCameraMode.Color

member.name: F:Accord.Video.Kinect.VideoCameraMode.Bayer
member.summary: 8 bit per pixel Bayer mode.

member.name: F:Accord.Video.Kinect.VideoCameraMode.InfraRed

member.name: T:Accord.Video.Kinect.KinectVideoCamera
member.summary: Video source for Microsoft Kinect's video camera.

remarks.para: The video source captures video data from Microsoft Kinect video camera, which is aimed originally as a gaming device for XBox 360 platform.

para.note: Prior to using the class, make sure you've installed Kinect's drivers as described on Open Kinect project's page.
In order to run correctly the class requires freenect.dll library to be put into solution's output folder. This can be found within the AForge.NET framework's distribution in Externals folder.

remarks.para: Sample usage:

member.name: E:Accord.Video.Kinect.KinectVideoCamera.NewFrame
member.summary: New frame event.

remarks.para: Notifies clients about new available frames from the video source.

para.note: Since video source may have multiple clients, each client is responsible for making a copy (cloning) of the passed video frame, because the video source disposes its own original copy after notifying of clients.

member.name: E:Accord.Video.Kinect.KinectVideoCamera.VideoSourceError
member.summary: Video source error event.
member.remarks: This event is used to notify clients about any type of errors occurred in video source object, for example internal exceptions.

member.name: E:Accord.Video.Kinect.KinectVideoCamera.PlayingFinished
member.summary: Video playing finished event.

remarks.para: This event is used to notify clients that the video playing has finished.

member.summary: Specifies video mode for the camera.

remarks.para: Default value of the property is set to .

member.summary: Resolution of video camera to set.

para.note: The property must be set before running the video source to take effect.

remarks.para: Default value of the property is set to .
